# QA Automation Prompt Rules

- Use Playwright/Test with TypeScript
- Apply Page Object Model (POM) and OOP principles
- Keep locators in a single file (e.g., selectors.ts)
- Avoid duplication (DRY principle)
- Use data-driven methods (JSON/CSV for test data)
- Add relevant comments for functional clarity
- Keep code clean and simple
